page.title: Homepage - NEKO SOFTWARE ENGINEERING CO.,LTD.
page.des_content: NEKO Software Engineering provides high-quality software development and technology consulting services for your business.
page.og_title: Web Development Company Offering Custom Website and Software Development Services
page.og_des: We specialize in creating custom websites and providing software development services tailored to your business needs.
page.twitter_title: Web Development Company Offering Custom Website and Software Development Services
page.twitter_des: We specialize in creating custom websites and providing software development services tailored to your business needs.

about.title: About Us - NEKO Software Engineering
about.des_content: We are a software development company committed to providing high-quality services to help your business grow sustainably.
about.og_des: A software development company offering website and software development services tailored to meet customer needs.
about.twitter_des: Learn more about our company, experts in website and software development.

service.title: Our Services - NEKO Software Engineering
service.des_content: We offer high-quality software and website development services to help your business grow and succeed.
service.og_des: We specialize in developing custom software and websites tailored to meet the needs of businesses.
service.twitter_des: We specialize in developing websites and software solutions that help businesses succeed.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio - NEKO Software Engineering
portfolio.des_content: We are proud to showcase our successful software and website development projects that helped our clients achieve their goals.
portfolio.og_des: Our portfolio includes custom websites and software projects that meet the high standards of our clients.
portfolio.twitter_des: Check out our software and website development projects that have empowered businesses to succeed.

contact.title: Contact Us - NEKO Software Engineering
contact.des_content: If you need more information about our services or have any questions, feel free to contact us using the information below.
contact.og_des: Get in touch with us to learn more about our software and website development services that suit your business needs.
contact.twitter_des: Contact us for further inquiries about our software and website development services.
